entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
